mapper.sql: id, stu_name, sno, password, major, origin, sex, entry_year, gra_year
mapper.insert: insert into stu_info (id, stu_name, sno, password, major, origin, sex, entry_year, gra_year) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{origin,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{entryYear,jdbcType=DATE}, #{graYear,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.update:
update stu_info
stu_name = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sno = #{sno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR},
major = #{major,jdbcType=CHAR},
origin = #{origin,jdbcType=CHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
entry_year = #{entryYear,jdbcType=DATE},
gra_year = #{graYear,jdbcType=DATE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
